title: Field Services
subtitle: end-to-end execution from request to resolution

xMatixPlatform.title: Field Services
xMatixPlatform.description1: Field service execution depends on tight coordination between service requests, technicians, parts, and customers. Execution breaks when scheduling, inventory, and service data are spread across disconnected systems.
xMatixPlatform.description2: xMatix enables end-to-end field service execution on a single operational foundation, ensuring faster response times, accurate fulfilment, and consistent service outcomes.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most field service organisations rely on separate tools for service intake, dispatch, inventory, and billing. While each system handles a part of the workflow, no platform owns execution end to end, leading to missed SLAs, manual coordination, and limited visibility.

ecosystem.title: Service & Ticketing Systems
ecosystem.description: Capture service requests and cases but lack real-time visibility into technician availability, skills, and parts readiness.

ecosystem.title: Scheduling & Dispatch Tools
ecosystem.description: Assign work orders without shared context across inventory, customer priority, and SLA commitments.

ecosystem.title: Inventory & Parts Management
ecosystem.description: Manage parts separately from service execution, causing delays when required materials are unavailable or misplaced.

ecosystem.title: Billing & Reporting Systems
ecosystem.description: Record service outcomes after the fact, limiting the ability to control execution quality during active jobs.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as the execution layer for field service operations, unifying service requests, dispatch, on-site execution, inventory, and closure into a single continuous workflow. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it ensures service execution is coordinated in real time, policy-driven, and fully visible across teams.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}}field services{{/highlight}} work on xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: Field service operations run on a shared execution layer, ensuring consistency, accountability, and real-time visibility from request to resolution.

features.title: Service Request & Prioritisation
features.description: Capture service requests and automatically prioritise them based on SLAs, customer impact, and operational rules.

features.title: Scheduling & Dispatch
features.description: Assign the right technician based on skills, location, availability, and workload while coordinating required parts.

features.title: On-Site Service Execution
features.description: Enable technicians to execute work with real-time access to job details, asset history, and inventory.

features.title: Completion & Closure
features.description: Confirm work completion, update systems automatically, capture costs, and close jobs with full auditability.

requestADemo.heading: See field services executed on xMatix
requestADemo.description: Request a demo to see how xMatix connects service requests, field teams, and operations on a single execution platform.
